info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 1:43AM EDT until May 14 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of northern Virginia, including the following county, Culpeper.
* WHEN...Until 745 AM EDT Wednesday.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 143 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated rising stream levels. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rixeyville... Cardova... Alanthus... Jeffersonton... Boston... Reva... - This includes the following Flood Prone Roads... Eggbornsville Rd near Cedar Glen Ln/Hazel River Rd and Waterford Road at Waterford Run. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM EDT THIS MORNING
